LanguageData.ATNM_NoneProtocolTooltip: Unassign current protocol and set the manipulator to minimal functionality.
LanguageData.ATNM_RampageProtocolTooltip: Induce a rampage, causing the pawn to attack all non-rampaging pawns and gain major stat boosts.
LanguageData.ATNM_StasisProtocolTooltip: Incapacitate the subject, knocking them out and allocating neural resources toward regeneration.
LanguageData.ATNM_TerrorProtocolTooltip: Terrorize the subject, swiftly increasing suppression and preventing rebellion at a steep mood penalty.
LanguageData.ATNM_NumbnessProtocolTooltip: Numb the subject's consciousness, gaining significant mood buffs and preventing all pain as a result.
LanguageData.ATNM_HarvestProtocolTooltip: Harvest the subject's skills all at once for skill and hacking points, killing the consciousness. (Opens a confirmation dialog)
LanguageData.ATNM_CultivationProtocolTooltip: Cultivate server skill points by intercepting learning, idly producing skill points but preventing all learning.
LanguageData.ATNM_ConversionProtocolTooltip: Convert hacking points into propaganda, reducing the subject's resistance, will, and certainty depending on their personal resistance.
LanguageData.ATNM_ReplacementProtocolTooltip: Replace the subject's consciousness with a new, random one. The manipulator chip will burn out in the process, and the consciousness will die. (Opens a confirmation dialog)
